TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MASUserResponseErrorBlock(MASUser user, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed MASUserResponseErrorBlock extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: MASUSer object with updated value which is also available through the current MASUser object that is making this request.
NSError object in case any error is encountered during the process.
Docs.summary: The MASUser specific (MASUser user, NSError error) block
